sentences.en: "There was no access to clean water, there was no access to basic education especially in the rural areas where the archaeology was," she says.
sentences.cn: 在那里的考古学特别是农村地区，我们并没有获得干净的水，有没有基本的教育的机会，“她说。

sentences.en: A distinction must be made between archaeology proper and science-based archaeology.
sentences.cn: 必须区分考古学本身和以科学为基础的考古学。

sentences.en: After and prove its key function in prehistoric archaeology from two aspects.
sentences.cn: 然后从两方面论证其在史前考古学中的核心作用.

sentences.en: Because of my studies in Near Eastern archaeology, I read up on the history of this region as of the 19th century — during the Ottoman Empire.
sentences.cn: 因为我对近东考古学的研究，所以我仔细研读了该地区的19世纪的历史---即奥斯曼帝国时代的历史。

sentences.en: He displayed interest in archaeology.
sentences.cn: 他对考古学有兴趣.

sentences.en: He is course tutor in archaeology at the University of Southampton.
sentences.cn: 他是南安普敦大学考古学课程导师。

sentences.en: He specializes in archaeology.
sentences.cn: 他专修考古学。

sentences.en: His special interest was archaeology and art history.
sentences.cn: 他对考古学和艺术史有特殊的兴趣.

sentences.en: I assume you want me to get in touch with the State Archaeology unit.
sentences.cn: 我猜你想要我去联系州考古协会.

sentences.en: I have a passion for archaeology .
sentences.cn: 我对考古学有热情。

sentences.en: I wonder if you have any interest in Greek archaeology?
sentences.cn: 我不知道你是否对希腊考古学感兴趣?

sentences.en: In archaeology, the exposure, recording, and recovery of buried material remains.
sentences.cn: 考古学中, 发掘 、 纪录并复原被掩埋遗迹的行为.

sentences.en: In my recent research, I found that all three come together and, what is more, they help me to show that archaeology has relevance – it is not just old stones and bones.
sentences.cn: 我在最近的研究中发现，这三点综合发生着作用，除此之外，它们也帮助我发现考古学的重要意义，它不仅仅意味着一堆石头和骨头。

sentences.en: Lily : The British Museum specialises more in antiques and archaeology.
sentences.cn: 大英博物馆更侧重于文物和考古.

sentences.en: Many specialistic techniques contribute to archaeology.
sentences.cn: 许多专业技术对考古学作出贡献.

sentences.en: Michel Foucault (1972), The Archaeology of Knowledge; hereafter this text will be abbreviated as AK.
sentences.cn: 米歇尔·福柯（1972），《知识考古学》，下文简称AK。

sentences.en: She teaches archaeology at the university.
sentences.cn: 她在大学里教考古学.

sentences.en: The newspaper article waked my interest in archaeology.
sentences.cn: 报纸上的文章激起了我对考古学的兴趣.

sentences.en: The old gentleman has always done research in archaeology.
sentences.cn: 老先生对考古学向有研究.

sentences.en: Underwater archaeology gives us the chance to paint a portrait on a much larger canvas.
sentences.cn: 水下考古学使我们有机会把考古学的研究领域扩展到更广的范围.

words.tran_cn: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的

trans.tran_en: the study of ancient societies by examining what remains of their buildings,  grave s  , tools etc
